title: ENGINE - IT CONTROLS GENERATION - STEP 03 - RECONCILIATION INTEGRITY 1 - WE P&C

task_list.instruction_title:
ENGINE to generate the corresponding IT CONTROLs,

**Phase: PreSECLI**

**C1001 **- Check volume of files before engine integration
**C1002 **- Dummies count in DICO tables
**C1003 **- Detail of Dummies in DICO tables
**C1003B **- List of duplicate  invariants
**C1004 **- Client Scope analysis
**C1005A **- List of duplicate keys in SG files
**C1006 **- Statistics on clients received by company
**C1017 **- List of migrated clients without any assets
**C1018 **- List of banks without ASSETS 
**C1019 **- Breakdown count of lines per received files
**C1099 **- Assets received by company
**C1200 **- List of missing manager codes in ATLAS (Outside 999)
**C1205 **- List of Missing Contributors in ATLAS (Outside 999)
**C1243 **- Tech. pre-check, Integrity of all tables
**C1243B **- Tech. pre-check, integrity of all tables (stats)
**C1047 **- STATISTICS CLIENTS BY CODE PM RM
